title: Mordekaiser being meta, what a time to be alive
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/1beebd039ae56f71d74bc7111bdcc415.png

thechamp that was never played is now played

replies.body:
Your boi?

If anything he's OUR boi. *communism intesifies*

Don't make me sue for custody.

Mordekaiser es numbero onu, no matter what meta, he'll be on top.

in all honesty though, i feel like the only reason i used to win so often with morde was because people geniunly didnt know what his abilities did.
Pretty sure he's good into champs like {{champion:157}} {{champion:58}} etc. So as those champs rise in popularity it would make sense that Morde rises as well.
